issue.title: Error in new catkin workspace setup

content.raw:
Lý,

Sorry to hear that you’re having trouble with your catkin workspace. Unfortunately, I’m not able to reproduce those errors. 

Do you experience the same errors with the [Docker image](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub)?

Notice that you can still develop your controller\(s\) for your team solution using a local catkin workspace and communicate with the SubT simulator, while it is running in its Docker container.  That is probably the best approach since it emulates the Cloudsim competition environment.
content.html:
Lý,

Sorry to hear that you’re having trouble with your catkin workspace. Unfortunately, I’m not able to reproduce those errors.

Do you experience the same errors with the Docker image?

Notice that you can still develop your controller(s) for your team solution using a local catkin workspace and communicate with the SubT simulator, while it is running in its Docker container. That is probably the best approach since it emulates the Cloudsim competition environment.
